com.github.sdorra.database

Class JPARule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sdorra.database.JPARule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.MethodRule

    public class JPARule
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.MethodRule
    The JPARule starts an in-memory sql database (namely apache derby). The database is started before each test method is executed and the database is shutdown after the method execution. The JPARule starts the in-memory database only if the method or the class is annotated with the JPA annotation.
    Author:
    Sebastian Sdorra

      Returns the EntityManagerFactory which is created for the specified persistence unit.
